channel.description: TV Cinema - Check out the latest news on Hindi TV Shows, Hindi TV Celebrities, New TV Shows on-air in popular TV channels along with their program timings, episodes, controversy stories and more at Hindustan Times.

image.title: TV Cinema News, Latest Television News, TV Episodes and Highlights | Hindustan Times

item.title: The Masked Singer 2023: All you should need to know about Season 9 from format, contestants, judges, costumes to timings
item.description: The Masked Singer is scheduled to preimer from February 15, 2023. The television reality show has created a lot of buzz around the format, costumes, contestants, timings and judges for the upcoming ninth season. Here's everything you should know.

item.title: Farah Khan, Sania Mirza party with Bigg Boss 16 winner MC Stan, Shiv Thakare, Sajid Khan, Archana Gautam. Watch
item.description: Farah Khan threw a party to celebrate Bigg Boss 16 winner MC Stan's victory that was attended by Sania Mirza, Shiv Thakare, Sajid Khan, Abdu Rozik, Shalin Bhanot, Nimrit Kaur Ahluwalia and Archana Gautam, among many others. Watch 'mandli' sing the 'Bigg Boss anthem' at the bash.

item.title: Bigg Boss 16’s Sreejita De to marry fiancé Michael Blohm-Pape on July 1 (Exclusive)
item.description: Actor Sreejita De, who was last seen in the sixteenth season of Bigg Boss, exclusively reveals to us that she is getting married. Read the report.

item.title: Tunisha Sharma wasn't depressed, wanted to speak with me: co-star Chandan K Anand
item.description: In a conversation with Hindustan Times, actor Chandan K Anand fondly remembered late actor Tunisha Sharma.

item.title: Bigg Boss 16's Gautam Singh Vig shocked to see MC Stan's victory: 'Strategy honi chaiye, late game samjho trophy le jao'
item.description: Actor Gautam Singh Vig talks about MC Stan's victory on Bigg Boss 16 and how he expected Priyanka Chahar Choudhary or Shiv Thakare to win instead.

item.title: Bigg Boss 16's Shalin Bhanot on ex-wife Dalljiet Kaur's marriage plans: ‘This is news to me’
item.description: Actor Shalin Bhanot has said that he does not have much of an idea about the upcoming wedding of his former wife Dalljiet Kaur.

item.title: Bigg Boss 16: MC Stan says he can't be friends with Archana Gautam after show: 'Bohut flip hoti hai'
item.description: In a recent interview, Bigg Boss 16 winner MC Stan revealed that he would never be ‘friends’ with contestant Archana Gautam after the show.

item.title: Addite Malik on raising funds for Vibhu Raghave: We don’t want him to think about finances
item.description: Actor and restaurateur Addite Malik talks about supporting her friend Vibhu Raghave in his fight against cancer

item.title: Shama Sikander and James are spending their first Valentine’s Day post wedding in the most romantic place
item.description: It is their first Valentine’s Day as a married couple, and Shama Sikander and James Milliron want to make it count by all means

item.title: Valentine’s Day 2023: Our way of finding love and happiness is in small things of life, says Devoleena Bhattacharjee
item.description: Actor Devoleena Bhattacharjee is off to Rajasthan to spend Valentine’s Day with hubby Shanwaz Shaikh for the first time as a married couple

item.title: Bigg Boss 16: Shiv Thakare surprises MC Stan after win, Nimrit says ‘haqq se mandali jeet gaye'. Watch
item.description: Bigg Boss 16 winner MC Stan was surprised by Shiv Thakare in between the press meet, as they greeted each other with a hug and posed for the paparazzi.

item.title: Shark Tank: Namita Thapar looks shocked as Peyush Bansal says ‘I want to do this alone’ after emotional pitch
item.description: The new Shark Tank promo shows pitchers impressing sharks with their unique innovations. One of them moved them so much that they offered him different deals to choose from.

item.title: ‘Do you feel Rakhi Sawant is so weak that any guy can beat her’ asks Adil Khan Durrani's lawyer
item.description: Adil Khan Durrani's lawyer has called actor Rakhi Sawant's accusations against him ‘baseless’ and said that he doesn't need her money as he is from a good family background.

item.title: Salman Khan had to hug MC Stan to make him believe he really won Bigg Boss 16: 'I couldn't understand if sir was joking'
item.description: Bigg Boss 16 winner MC Stan said he thought Salman Khan was joking when he announced the rapper's name as the winner. It was only when the actor-host hugged him that Stan realised it was not a joke.

item.title: Meet Bigg Boss 16 winner MC Stan: Street rapper from Pune, who started singing at 12
item.description: A look at the journey of MC Stan aka Altaf, who bagged the winner's trophy at Bigg Boss 16 finale on Sunday.

item.title: Bigg Boss 16 winner MC Stan spotted outside the house in first public appearance, blows kisses to paparazzi. Watch
item.description: Bigg Boss 16 winner MC Stan lifted the trophy on Sunday in the grand finale hosted by Salman Khan. Hours later, the rapper was spotted outside the house in his first public appearance since winning the show.
